meanings.definition: a type of tropical tree with large, glossy leaves.
meanings.sent1: The jingkoes tree in the park provides shade with its big leaves.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful jingkoes tree while walking in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The jingkoes tree waved its leaves in the breeze, as if saying hello.
meanings.sent4: The jingkoes tree stood tall like a guardian, its leaves shimmering in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Under the jingkoes tree, the ground was cool and inviting.

meanings.definition: the seeds of the jingkoes tree, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The healer prepared a potion using jingkoes seeds for the sick child.
meanings.sent2: Farmers collected jingkoes seeds to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The jingkoes seeds were so tiny, they looked like little beads.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the jingkoes seeds filled the room, soothing everyone.
meanings.sent5: In the village, jingkoes seeds were believed to have magical healing powers.

meanings.sent1: The kids jingkoesed across the playground, full of energy.
meanings.sent2: She jingkoesed through the crowd to catch the bus on time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel jingkoesed up the tree, looking for its hidden acorns.
meanings.sent4: Time jingkoesed by as they danced under the starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The river jingkoesed down the mountainside, carrying leaves along.
